content:
all in the details

Offer is available for select dates October 10, 2016 through January 15, 2017

Grand opening group offer! Enjoy discounted group rates of up to 15% off for select dates for fall 2016 and winter 2017 and help us celebrate our grand opening. Valid on group bookings of 10 rooms per night, dates are subject to availability.

Need assistance? Our dedicated reservations team is available around the clock:

Gates South Beach Service Centre 800-445-8667 or
info@gatessouthbeach.com

Contact Us
